InvalidContractSignature().notice: Thrown when the recovered contract signature is incorrect

InvalidSignature().notice: Thrown when the recovered signer is equal to the zero address

InvalidSignatureLength().notice: Thrown when the passed in signature is not a valid length

InvalidSigner().notice: Thrown when the recovered signer does not equal the claimedSigner
